short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Easily contribute your human-models conversations, to create an ever-growing dataset for the benefit of the open-source community!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension makes it easy for you to automatically collect and upload the conversations you are having with open large language models. Together we will create an ever-growing chat-bot conversations dataset, a valuable resource for the open-source community. The conversations will be released with the most permissive restriction allowed by the specific model.
